remarks: The vector sum operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhvadd.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhvadd.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvadd.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvadd.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhvadd.f $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhvadd.s $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvhvadd.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
dvhvadd $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. ( T X. E ) /\ G e. ( T X. E ) ) ) -> ( F .+ G ) = <. ( ( 1st ` F ) o. ( 1st ` G ) ) , ( ( 2nd ` F ) .+^ ( 2nd ` G ) ) >. ) $.
